recipe.title: Spanish Style Snap Beans
recipe.description: These crispy greens beans are perfect as a healthy side or for a snack.
recipe.instructions:
Cover and cook beans in 1/4 cup boiling water until just tender (about 5 minutes). Drain well.
	In a separate pan, cook onion and green pepper in margarine until tender.
	Add tomatoes, basil, pepper, and beans. Mix well. Heat thoroughly.Â
recipe.notes:
• Frozen green beans can be substituted for fresh, just decrease your cook time to 2 minutes. 

Nutritional Information

30 calories, 1g fat, 1g protein, 5g carb, 2g fiber, 10mg sodium, 35% vitmain C, 15% vitamin A, 4% Iron, 2% calcium
